channel.title: Rune-Server
channel.description:
[center]Welcome to Rune-Server [url=http://www.rswebclients.com/play/Runeserver][b]PLAYNOW[/b][/url] Forums:coming soon
Features: Strict Economy Multiple traveling ways Rock cake (for Dh Pking) Rares are bought into game by drops (Like today crabs drop H'weens (Rare), tomorrow they wont.)
You may think its a regular PI, and youre right, but i made it more fun to play. It takes longer to train, dragon weapons are rare. etc.
Media: [img]http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/9072/5b7s.png[/img] [img]http://img196.imageshack.us/img196/5013/rjba.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/w4mBJhz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/H957suK.png[/img] [img]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/7577/lavm.png[/img]
[/center]

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Steso:

Also it is not a remake, it is a strict rsps.

What the hell do you think a remake is? O.O

[quote=“Steso, post:10, topic:525898”][quote author=Kodiak link=topic=644640.msg4337653#msg4337653 date=1374633249]
rune-server has their name trademarked, if you make a single dime off of this server (which in donations you probably will) then enjoy being sued
[/quote]Untill i see lawyers at my door, idgaf[/quote]
Are you a complete idiot?

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Server
item.dc:creator: @Steso Steso
item.description:
@Steso wrote:

Actually Gnome glider took me ages to add, also the monsters that drop rares are available for a short amount of time, and since crabs got 50hp ,they are not so fast to kill
Also it is not a remake, it is a strict rsps.

item.title: Rune-Server
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

I actually love the idea of specific, randomized monsters dropping rares. HOWEVER, I do not believe that you should tell users what monster is dropping what rare. This would force those treasure hunters to really work hard for their loot, and would both create competition as well as create a community that is focused on hunting down these rares.

Instead, I think you should have a message saying “In # hours a rare item will begin dropping from a monster” or something of the sort, this way players know when you begin their hunt for the next rare and don’t continually attack a monster they do not need to.

Read full topic
